title: Cursive Font, or Plain Please Advice
content:
Hello Everyone,

Can you kindly advice what fonts face are they ? not sure they are cursive or the indent is very close.

Thanking you in anticipation.

Regards,  
Hasnain Munawar

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054233im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Cuckfield1_5560.jpg)

Font: 

 Freestyle Script (Adobe version) 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054233/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: hasnain125

comments.content: Looks like Martin Wait's [Freestyle Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317054233/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/freestyle+script) (and possibly Adobe version to get the closer /k).
